sources.title: The Bulleteers (1942)
sources.description: Criminals with rocket powered car loot and extort the city, and only Superman can stop them! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-bulleteers-1942/

metadata.Plot: Extortionists with a super-powerful bullet-shaped flying rocket car threaten destruction to Metropolis. At first they seem to defeat even Superman, but their capture of Lois Lane spurs him to new efforts...
metadata.Writer: Joe Shuster, Jerry Siegel, Bill Turner
metadata.Actors: Bud Collyer, Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck
